8.28.17  1:24 pm   11.7.10 11:59 pm Congratulations on graduating! What are you going to do now?

     the date you are referencing is 7 years in the past, so i'm not sure what you mean by 'now'

8.28.17  1:13 pm   Isn't it crazy how at the beginning of the 20th century people were still using horse-drawn carriages and oil lamps, and now we have particle accelerators, the large hadron collider, space travel, gene therapy, organ printing, the internet, etc??? Do you think we'll make as crazy of technological and scientific advancements from 2000-2100 as we did from 1900-2000? If so, I feel like we are on a very fast track to some seriously heavy shit.

     i agree. this is actually part of an even larger pattern of steep acceleration

8.28.17  1:09 pm   If i am not a thing and everybody isnt a thing, then how come they say we are a thing when we arent but we are?

     have you thought about spending some time outside

8.28.17  1:08 pm   by 'making music to sound like voice' i mean like you do in a play featuring power block and your history videos.

     i just play whatever i think would support each moment of the video. the more complex lines are usually improvised, and i keep doing it until i get something that really fits

And it did have some parts that felt like exact details of my life, not only that vague stuff I thought horoscopes were about.

     there is complete rhyme and reason to every molecule and particle in the entire universe. whether or not anyone can summarize that into english, is another story

8.27.17  5:39 pm   (4.16.16  2:11 pm) what you mean with "find out soon enough"?

     i'm actually still trying to figure out the right response for these questions. the format is always the same, "if you were THIS, what THIS would you be"... basically what that question says to me is, 'i just made up half a story and now you have to finish it'. which is a nice idea, but i am already working round the clock trying to make stories and i don't have time to finish everyone's stories. if someone imagines i'm a pumpkin, i think it is their responsibility to finish the story. they can't just come to me and say 'i just imagined you as something, now you have to fill in the rest.' only the person who envisioned the story can really complete it properly. i am still searching for a succinct response that i am comfortable with, and i haven't quite found it yet

     no

8.27.17  1:19 pm   How do blacks work?

     it absorbs the light, not reflecting it. so that means you see less light coming from that particular location, so it looks dark. black items also can get hotter quicker, for the same reason
